snippet: Djokovic posted an impressive 6-1, 6-1 win over Marin Cilic in his opening round-robin match at the ATP Finals.
abstract: Novak Djokovic, the two-time defending champion, extended his indoor winning streak to 28 matches with an impressive win over Marin Cilic in his opening round-robin match at the ATP Finals in London.
lead_paragraph: Djokovic posted an impressive 6-1, 6-1 win over Marin Cilic in his opening round-robin match at the ATP Finals.

headline.main: Novak Djokovic Extends His Indoor Winning Streak to 28 Matches
